name: Magic 9 Ball
description:
Have you ever asked yourself a question an couldn't answer it?  Worry no more as the Magic 9 Ball is here! Just think of a question to ask him and click on him. Using state of the art technology lets him "always" choose the right answer. This kind and compassionate Ball is the "best" solution for a unsolved question. 

click to reveal answer

right click to shake

Please leave feedback if possible and thank you for playing!

More answers coming soon

Feel free to write some responses for the 9 Ball in the comments because I might add it in
